title: Where the lands are located in a unique/unusual area, particularly suitable for development of tourism in view of an existing water body, scenic beauty, tree plantations or geological formation can be specified as TDA
clause_text: Where the lands are located in a unique/unusual area, particularly suitable for development of tourism in view of an existing water body, scenic beauty, tree plantations or geological formation can be specified as TDA. The minimum area of such site however shall not be less than
